title: NOD32 Antivirus 3.0.642(with unlimited update fix) TICI333 ORIG
description:
*****UPDATES**********JANUARY 2009******

AS OF 1/09 I HAVE THIS INSTALLED ON ONE HOMEMADE INTEL MACHINE, THE CRACK NO LONGER SEEMS TO WORK ON THIS SETUP, THE TRIAL SEEMS TO CONTINUE TO COUNT DOWN. I WILL VERIFY WHETHER THIS IS STILL WORKING ON OTHER SETUPS (MOBO'S, PROCESSORS ETC) AND LET YOU KNOW.  I WAS ABLE TO UNINSTALL THE CRACK AND THE PROGRAM AND REINSTALL THE PROGRAM WITH A FRESH TRIAL, BIG DEAL, RIGHT? 

::::::::::::::::::::::::SECOND UPDATE   1/14/09::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

Checked with about 14 other people, continues to work fine on a number of Machines and MOBO's problem seems to be limited to my Gigabyte EP35DS3L. I am also running it on a 2 Dells (Optiplex and Vostro)updating without problems.



::::::::::::::::::::::::THIRD UPDATE     3/17/09:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

It is still working and updating on a number of systems of varied makes and models and oddly not working on similar rigs with slightly different hardware. If you had it installed prior I would suggest making sure the prior install was completely removed prior to reinstalling. You might want to follow this guide from Eset: <a href="
http://kb.eset.com/esetkb/index?page=content&id=SOLN558" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://kb.eset.com/esetkb/index?page=content&id=SOLN558</a>

********************************************************************************
********************************************************************************


This is a Repack (actually it's a REPOST nothing has been changed from the original) of a TICI333 upload, this is not mine.


ESET NOD32 Antivirus 3.0.642



Changelog for 3.0.642

    * Fixed problem with EAV installation to machine with older version of CheckPoint
    * Fixed few firewall - related problems
    o fixed issue with false positive reports of attacks
    o fixed issue with network browsing
    o fixed issue with spurious firewall rule creation
    * Fixed issue with Web Access Protection module in Windows Vista
    * Fixed few issues in Microsoft Outlook Express and Windows Mail
    o fixed issue with disappearing user account information
    o fixed issue being unable to send receipts/delivery reports
    o fixed filtering/highlighting messages not functioning
    * Other small fixes







ESET NOD32 Antivirus System - Integrated, Real-Time Protection against viruses, worms, trojans, spyware, adware, phishing, and hackers. Best detection,
 fastest performance & smallest footprint.
NOD32 Antivirus System provides well balanced, state-of-the-art protection against threats endangering your PC and enterprise systems running various 
platforms from Microsoft Windows, through a number of UNIX/Linux, Novell, MS DOS operating systems to Microsoft Exchange Server, Lotus Domino and other
 mail servers.

cleverly-disguised malware.
